title: Are there any books for human anatomy and physiology? - Quora

response.answer_text: FOR ANATOMY B D Chaurasia-(gross)[Indian ]Gray's anatomy[foreign]Langman's embryology[foreign]Inderbir Singh embryology[Indian]Defiore's for histology[foreign]Netters for atlas[foreign]FOR PHYSIOLOGY Guyton and hall[foreign]Ganong[foreign]A K Jain[Indian]Semulingam[indian]
This is the best book for human anatomy and physiology. Easy text, beautiful images, summary of each chapter etc. I can bet you won’t be disappointed!
